lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Australian dollar rose more than 40 points and money market interest rates retreated on the better than expected improvement in the February current account deficit, but economists and dealers were cautious about identifying it as the start of a downward trend.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A> senior dealer Peter Nicolls cautioned that in the long term the currency and interest rates were too high for import substitution and export industries.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: We should remember we are paying something like seven to eight billion dollars simply to service our foreign debt and that is not going to go away in the near term," Buttrose said.
